welcome_message_title: Welcome to Santa Lucia di Piave
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Lucia di Piave, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and discover all that our beloved city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited to certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marco Polo Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.
